Uses of Package
com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo

Packages that use com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo
com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it. 
com.luigisgro.cqf.job This package contains the high-level implementation of the complete processing for: HJM: HJMJob FDM: FDMJob together with support classes to read job configuration from property files. 
com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo The Monte Carlo framework, in a generic implementation for curve time series, with a generic number of factors. 
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo used by com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm
MultiFactorModel
          This interface isolates the model-depending features of a Monte Carlo simulation: the generation of a scenario for the underlying.
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo used by com.luigisgro.cqf.job
MonteCarloEvaluator
          Objects responsible for calculating the derivative value corresponding to a given iteration of the Monte Carlo simulation, from a state of the underlying (scenario).
RandomVectorGenerator
          Generator of vectors with a suitable distribution for Monte Carlo integration
 

Classes in com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo used by com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo
CurveTimeSeriesOperatorEvaluator
          A simple evaluator that always stop at the given number of iterations
MonteCarloEvaluator
          Objects responsible for calculating the derivative value corresponding to a given iteration of the Monte Carlo simulation, from a state of the underlying (scenario).
MultiFactorModel
          This interface isolates the model-depending features of a Monte Carlo simulation: the generation of a scenario for the underlying.
RandomVectorGenerator
          Generator of vectors with a suitable distribution for Monte Carlo integration
